At character creation, a borai selects one of the following races as his original living form and gains the species trait indicated in parenthesis for the selected race: @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.races.GHIntVN70xTt2Tlo]{Android} (upgrade slot), @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.races.AMBcyDZDtJ1OOzh3]{Human} (skilled), @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.races.dGlSCMtFZ2ZIKUpl]{Kasatha} (four-armed), lashunta (limited telepathy), @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.races.VIJ6pdOVTJle3vJx]{Shirren} (blindsense), @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.races.7VtfabTXl7NEXC6u]{Vesk} (natural weapons), or ysoki (cheek pouches). A GM can, at her discretion, allow a borai to choose another humanoid race, along with an appropriate species trait. Additionally, when a borai attempts to disguise himself as a member of his selected race, the DC of his Disguise check is not modified as a result of disguising himself as a different creature type.
